system.description: At level 14, you can transform yourself into a powerful denizen of the depths. When you use Wild Shape, you can instead spend 2 uses to transform into a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.m6oqt6ck11niwcff]{Plesiosaurus}, or 4 uses to transform into a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.ev664zs4nll03ybn]{Young River Dragon}. At level 20, when you use Wild Shape you can spend 6 uses to transform into an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.89ons9dm94ikkb1l]{Adult River Dragon}.
